titleStmt.title: By his Highnes Councill in Scotland, for the government thereof. It having pleased the Lord to visit our brethren and neighbors of the United Providences with the pestilence ...
titleStmt.author: Scotland. Privy Council.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by Christopher Higgins, in Harts-Close, over against the Trone-Church,

notesStmt.note: Title from caption and first lines of text.
Dated at end: Given at Edinburgh the seventeenth day of October, 1655.
Order to print dated: Wednesday the 17. day of October, 1655. Signed: Emanuel Downing, Cl. of the Council.
Reproduction of the original in the National Library of Scotland.
